name: Pocket Boss
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Abhan, Bhotaar, Chi and Dom Patterns of the same Boss Example: #L "Abhan Pattern of 'Screech'" "229180" #L "Bhotaar Pattern of 'Screech'" "229181" #L "Chi Pattern of 'Screech'" "229182" #L "Dom Pattern of 'Screech'" "229183" #L "Crystal Filled by the Source" "229604" a special Novictum ( ie : #L "Cataclysmic Birth of Novictum" "229949" ) #L "Ancient Novictum Refiner" "229870" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Abhan Pattern + Bhotaar Pattern = Aban-Bhotar Assembly Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Aban-Bhotar Assembly + Chi Pattern = Aban-Bhotar-Chi Assembly Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Aban-Bhotar-Chi Assembly + Dom Pattern = Complete Blueprint Pattern ( ie: #L "Complete Blueprint Pattern of 'Screech'" "229186") Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Ancient Novictum Refiner + a special Novictum = #L "Subdued Flow of Novictum" "229924" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Crystal Filled by the Source + Complete Blueptrint Pattern = Etched Notum Crystal ( ie: #L "Notum Crystal with Etched 'Screech'" "229187") Skills: | NP | ------------------------------ Subdued Flow of Novictum + Notum Crystal with Etched = Novictalized Notum Crystal ( ie: #L "Novictalized Notum Crystal with 'Screech'" "229188") Skills: | QP | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Use the Novictalized Notum Crystal on an Incarnator on SL. take care, the user of the crystal will fall to 1 HP !!
